item.title: Purge emails with ExchangeOnlineManagement
item.description: This PowerShell script imports the Exchange Online Management module and connects to Exchange Online, performs a "hard delete" of phishing emails by using a compliance search action, and then disconnects from Exchange Online PowerShell without a confirmation prompt or any notification text.
